Fox and Friends allow lunatic Christian pastor Jerry Falwell, Jr. to imply that coronavirus might be a bioweapon created by North Korea's Kim Jong-Un to attack the United States. David Pakman discusses this appearance by Falwell Jr. and Fox's reckless reaction. "Every aspect of this appearance is weaponized ignorance and it's irresponsible," he says.
